ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet -Reply
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... True... but to be honest it is hard to find a group and get the rythm down unless you have HOURS of contigous play time.  ( a little solo is not a
ygData.messageBody:
> I have to say I am a little confused. Verant has specifically designed
the
> game with a group in mind, yet we are arguing the value of a wizard
> according to his solo ability. I find that odd.

True... but to be honest it is hard to find a group and get the rythm down
unless you have HOURS of contigous play time. ( a little solo is not a bad
thing, and i never expect lots of exp from solo. I would just like to do it
when I have to be without being afraid of my shadow)

> All I can say is, give me a tank, then a target, then the location you
want
> me to dispose of the remains. If you worry about a creature beating on
you,
> bring a wizard along. It won't hit you for long.

Very true in a group I never feel weak. (except for med time) It is just
hard watching others pass me by in levels because we are Wizards and then I
can't even solo to catch up.

> Calyn of Bristlebane

Rutree
